title: volkshashdev

content: ####                 ####      ####                  ####              ####      ####                       ####     ###################                ####   ###################                 ####      ####       ####                       ####   ####        ####                    #####################                  ####################                  ######      ####                                   ####        ####                                         ##         ####                                                    Volkshash - A number of miners creating hashes.    Introduction : Key Points of Volkshash:1) First Incentive : High Effort and High Masternode Cost 585 000 000 . Only 3743 Masternodes exist and the reward is 5% per total block ; this is to prevent masternodes controlling the overall market liquidity and exponentiation masternode control. Sole purpose of a masternode is to allow privatesend and instasend to mix transactions. 2) Second Incentive : POWAR REWARD 100 VHH cost per transaction. Every volkshash transaction will be given back to the miner as incentive. The more activity that takes place the more the miner can receive .   3) Third Incentive : The Block Fifthening / 20% or 1/5Deflationary block reward system . Block rewards reduce 20% every 87600 blocks created on the blockchain. 4) Slow Start on POWAR and MASTERNODE PROOF OF WORK:VHH 5000 from block 0 to 100, Masternode reward starts giving 5% (of total block) from block height #150000 to prevent exponentiation masternode growth or masternode centralization. You can launch a masternode from Block height #1 the reward is 0.0000002% (of total block). This will allow Mastnodes being launched without overwhelming the network.5) No Asics / No GPU CPU miners only , YesPower is only CPU mineable at this stage . Low entry mining for all.6) VHH 1.000   = 1000 Volkoshis/Satoshis . Volkshash has only 3 denominations. FOR MORE INFORMATION READ THE HASHPAPER :  https://volkshash.org Volkshash Basic InformationCoin NameVolkshash CoinCoin TickerVHHCoin Mining AlgoYesPowerMining Block Reward Type POWAR (Proof Of Work comments.author: volkshashdev
comments.body: Quote from: Bacardi Toni on March 17, 2023, 06:21:30 PMYou write there is a block reward of 5000000, but the explorer says 5000Slow start - Block 1 to Block 100 will be VHH 5000 after that the value picks up. Kindly read the HashPaper it explains quite a bit how the coin work

comments.body: Thanks, I hadn't seen that.Good project start, everything works fine.

comments.body: Quote from: Bacardi Toni on March 17, 2023, 06:31:37 PMThanks, I hadn't seen that.Good project start, everything works fine.   Well I hope so it took over 1 year of careful and painful development  Each value has been tested over 22 pre alphas , 14 source reworks . Enjoy the art !

comments.author: chpendi
comments.body: how to proceed for a masternode?

comments.author: volkshashdev
comments.body: Quote from: chpendi on March 17, 2023, 09:01:18 PMhow to proceed for a masternode?That i still need to do   Masternodes do start from block #1 but a guide can be done a tad later. Important Note:585 000 000 is required to host a masternode and till block# 150 000 the reward will be +- VHH 1 . Then the reward will change to 5% per block , this will allow the network to grow without masternodes ruling the network  , as stated in Hashpaper . Will post a guide later when time of fine tuning is done  , Checking functions and stability first of Volkshash as some have nuclear powered CPUs .  You can follow any dash masternode guide if you are in a rush. Note masternodes purpose is not to overthrow the volkshash economy this is to protect both miner and user.

comments.author: volkshashdev
comments.body: Quote from: chpendi on March 18, 2023, 07:00:32 AMWARNING THE WEBSITE "Volkhash Pool http://pool.volkshash.org/" IS REPORTED AS NOT SECURE!if it is possible to change it would be better.!Quoteand http://explorer.volkshash.org/ also not secure...!Yes this is running as http as it does not store information and only output information . Will secure the channels with a certificate bot  . Keep in mind the project just started, a few things will need to be attended here and there. Quotediscord and telegram Will create a discord channel next week to all users , currently monitoring all issues that might arise  Quotertplant pool Yes the more pools the better then i can attend to the main pool SSL certificate.To all just relax and mine ,it's still very early in the project .
